result.title: Policy paper on the discourses and debates on immigration society
result.description: "Report on the discourses and debates on immigration society in Germany, Hungary, Poland, France and Sweden (published on the project’s website) including a two page policy brief (EC template). In addition, the consortium envisages the possibility of organising a ""policy-roundtable"" (half-day meeting) in Brussels between the coordinator and relevant EC asylum policy officer/s."

result.title: Review essay of approaches to cosmopolitan democracy
result.description: Review essay of approaches to cosmopolitan justice and democracy: The essay will describe the various existing models, recast them in their theoretical and political context and expose their key concepts and arguments. It will clarify the different kinds of cosmopolitanism that these approaches suggest, especially for Europe, and determine if some elements of those conceptions complement or exclude each other. The essay will also explain, which could be the most attractive approach for Europe considering how the migration and refugee crisis affects and changed the European norm and value context.

result.title: Policy Research Alert on preparing successful EU migration/refugee policies
result.description: Policy Research Alert on preparing successful EU migration/refugee policies in the context of different political perspectives – between re-nationalization and transformation into fairly open immigration societies – in different member states.

result.title: General value landscape matrix
result.description: The general value landscape matrix that will use the value-related grammar and contain data from the findings in the two previously mentioned reports. It will be published as a publicly available tool on the website of the project. This matrix will be constantly refined with input from the other WPs and become more comprehensive throughout NOVAMIGRA’s evolution.
